Experience Personalized Care with Dr. Manish Sharma & Dr. Gauri Mehra

At Gaurnish Health, we believe in a holistic approach to wellness. Dr. Manish Sharma, our experienced General Physician, and Dr. Gauri Mehra, our certified Dietician, work together to provide tailored health solutions for your unique needs. Whether you require medical treatment or nutritional guidance, our experts ensure comprehensive care under one roof.

About Dr. Manish Sharma (General Physician)

Dr. Manish Sharma is a trusted General Physician in Ajmer with years of experience in diagnosing and treating a wide range of medical conditions. His patient-centric approach ensures accurate diagnosis, effective treatment, and preventive care for long-term well-being.

Services Offered by Dr. Manish Sharma:

  • General Health Check-ups – Routine and preventive health screenings.
  • Chronic Disease Management – Diabetes, hypertension, thyroid disorders, and more.
  • Infectious Disease Treatment – Fever, infections, and seasonal illnesses.
  • Lifestyle & Wellness Counseling – Guidance for a healthier lifestyle.
  • Geriatric Care – Specialized care for elderly patients.

About Dr. Gauri Mehra (Certified Dietician)

Dr. Gauri Mehra is a skilled Dietician and Nutritionist who designs customized diet plans to help patients achieve their health goals. Whether it's weight management, disease-specific nutrition, or improving overall wellness, her expertise ensures sustainable results.

Services Offered by Dr. Gauri Mehra:

  • Weight Management Programs – Personalized diet plans for weight loss/gain.
  • Medical Nutrition Therapy – Diets for diabetes, PCOS, heart health, etc.
  • Sports & Fitness Nutrition – Optimized nutrition for athletes.
  • Pediatric & Maternal Nutrition – Healthy eating for kids and expecting mothers.
  • Detox & Wellness Diets – Cleansing and rejuvenation plans.

Why Choose Gaurnish Health?

  • Integrated Care: Combined expertise of a physician and dietician for complete wellness.
  • Personalized Treatment: Customized health plans based on individual needs.
  • Evidence-Based Approach: Scientifically backed treatments and dietary solutions.
  • Patient Education: Empowering patients with knowledge for long-term health.

Book Your Consultation Today

Take the first step towards better health with Dr. Manish Sharma and Dr. Gauri Mehra at Gaurnish Health. Whether you need medical care or nutritional guidance, we’re here to help you achieve optimal wellness.
